headline: Salesforce, Inc. (CRM): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Salesforce, Inc. on LongYield’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on CRM. Salesforce, Inc.’s share was trading at $236.58 as of October 15th. CRM’s trailing and forward P/E were 34.72 and 18.87 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Salesforce, the leading cloud-based CRM provider, is evolving its business […]

headline: Salesforce (CRM): Assessing Valuation After Recent 10% Share Price Gain
summary: Salesforce (CRM) shares have caught the attention of traders recently, following modest gains of nearly 10% over the past week. This move comes after a period of volatility for the stock, as investors weigh its recent performance against broader market trends. See our latest analysis for Salesforce. The recent jump in Salesforce’s share price follows a tough year, with a 20.34% drop year-to-date. That said, momentum is starting to shift, as this week’s nearly 10% share price return hints at...

headline: Why Salesforce (CRM) Is Up 9.9% After Launching Agentforce 360 and Expanding AI Partnerships
summary: At Dreamforce 2025, Salesforce launched Agentforce 360, a unified AI platform, and announced a series of major partnerships with technology leaders including Google, OpenAI, Stripe, and Anthropic to expand AI capabilities and industry reach across its ecosystem. This wave of innovation showcases Salesforce’s focus on agentic AI and enterprise automation, with early customer adoption and analyst support signaling heightened optimism around its long-term potential. We'll explore how the...
